column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Art Institute is one of the best art museums in the the country
column2: that's for sure. But it's ridiculously expensive
column3: for everything. The work is great and a pretty wide selection
column4: though a major attraction tends to be Impressionism. I really wish they would show more of the things they have in the back
column5: for instance prints like German Expressionist etchings.
